title: (x) Hasselblad Center Poster, sans serif? - MT Grotesque {Jan}
content:
I know I know it, I just can't remember… anyone know?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020161108im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mo_poster2-1_6010.jpg)
author: Biff

comments.content:
Some version of Akzidenz Grotesk surely, but which one??

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020161108/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

Nah, that awkward "a"…  
I think my money's on [Monotype Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020161108/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/monotype_grotesque_by_adobe_roman/).
I'd say Gothic 720 Roman is pretty close.
Gothic 720 is Bitstream’s version of Monotype Grotesque, basically the same typeface.

Jürgen, it’s not.  
It is either MT Grotesque or Gothic 720.
Shame on me! I think you’re right, Jan. The 5 and 9 are narrower in MT Grotesque. These old Grotesques are all very close.
Thanks guys. Glad we sorted that out.
